li.Students must earn a grade of \"C\" (2.0: Students must earn a grade of "C" (2.0) or better in each required course used to satisfy the minor.
li.Grades less than \"C\" (2.0) cannot be u: Grades less than "C" (2.0) cannot be used towards the minor.

courseSection0.text:
College of Community Innovation and Education
Criminal Justice Department
Health Sciences I (HS1), 311
407-823-2603
cjadvise@ucf.edu
Associate Professor and Undergraduate Program Coordinator: Dr. Cory Watkins
Cory.Watkins@ucf.edu
Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
Students must earn a grade of "C" (2.0) or better in each required course used to satisfy the minor.
Grades less than "C" (2.0) cannot be used towards the minor.
Prerequisite Courses
None

text.College of Community Innovation and Educ: College of Community Innovation and Education

courseSection0.text1:
Complete the following: 
CCJ3024 - Criminal Justice System (3)
CCJ3014 - Crime in America (3)
courseSection0.text3:
Complete at least 2 of the following: 
CJL3510 - Prosecution and Adjudication (3)
CJC3010 - Corrections and Penology (3)
CJE4014 - Police and Society (3)
courseSection0.text4:
Earn at least 6 credits from the following types of courses: 
Criminal Justice courses (selected with aid of an advisor)

li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship or Independent Study credit c: Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements

At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

buttons: CJL - Criminal Justice Law and Process
